message: I'd greatly appreciate any advice, suggestions, feature ideas, etc
how about some screenshots of what the app looks like before having to sign up
maybe some examples of thoughts someone might want to see again?
Yeah, what @athst said. I have to think really hard to figure out what I'd use your app for; a couple of screenshots of a typical use case could go a long way
Some things you might add: permalinks for each thought, ability to edit them, export, encryption
Hi! I'm an user of ThoughtBack.
Also, a quick way to favorite a thought, (a star), to set them apart. The star would behave as a hashtag.

Maybe it would work if a 'thought' could be not just text but also an image (thumbnail + lightbox), an embedded video or slide plus a few words and hashtags, etc. I think that would make the app way more useful.
